headline.main: Transcript: Army Interview with Bowe Bergdahl

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In an August 2014 interview with an Army investigator, Sergeant Bergdahl described his unusual upbringing, his “fantastic plan” to leave the base in Afghanistan and his hope to move on with his life.
lead_paragraph: In an August 2014 interview with an Army investigator, Sergeant Bergdahl described his unusual upbringing, his “fantastic plan” to leave the base in Afghanistan and his hope to move on with his life.
